== Paravur (M) (803287) ==

Paravur (M) is a town in the [[Paravur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 9.02 sq. km. and harbouring 8095 households with total population of 31503 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 258 km. Male population is 15060 and female population is 16443. Scheduled Caste population is 1577 and Scheduled Tribes population is 117. Census Location Code of the town is 803287<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 30 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 16 km.
